topic.title: EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR RECEPTOR MUTATIONAL STATUS
topic.shortdesc: The mutational status of the Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor (EGFR) (a receptor found on the surface of CELLS) during a Lung Cancer Care Spell.
